headline: Lantheus (LNTH) Valuation Revisited After Truist Upgrade on Double-Digit Growth Potential
summary: Lantheus Holdings (LNTH) just caught a tailwind after Truist Securities upgraded the stock to Buy, arguing the market is still underappreciating its double digit growth potential into 2026 and beyond. See our latest analysis for Lantheus Holdings. The Truist upgrade comes after a choppy stretch, with the 1 month share price return of 22.24 percent and 3 month share price return of 25.84 percent helping claw back some of this year’s weaker share price performance. At the same time, the 5 year...

headline: Why Analysts See Tronox Holdings Story Shifting Amid Divided Views On Valuation And Outlook
summary: Tronox Holdings has seen a modest uptick in its fair value estimate, rising from about $4.63 to roughly $4.82 per share, even as the discount rate remains steady at 12.5% and revenue growth assumptions are tempered. This shift reflects a market narrative that is being pulled in two directions, with some analysts emphasizing structural tailwinds and others warning that the recent share price rally may be running ahead of fundamentals. Stay tuned to learn how you can track these shifting views...

headline: Truist: The Same As It Ever Was... And That's Not A Good Thing
summary: Truist shows bottom-tier ROE and ROTCE, average recent performance, solid efficiency, stable credit, and outdated growth initiatives. Read why TFC stock is a hold.
